name: Lab'scape
description:
Lab'scape is a 3D escape game.

You are a scientist trapped in his laboratory. With the help of a mirror, you must get out of the room to win the game.

Solve puzzles in order to survive ! 

______________________________________________________________

Lab'scape is a game developed by 8 students of IIM as part of a 5 days Game Jam on the theme of closed session.

___________________________________________________

Team :

Game designers

- Julien BULANGER, Laura DELIGNIÈRES, Alexandre LINEL, Pierre MALLET -

Developers
